ceterms:description: Students applying for undergraduate admission in a bachelor's program must have:
ceterms:name: Brandman University - Undergraduate Admission for Bachelor's Program

ceterms:condition: At least 12 transferable baccalaureate-level credits (or the equivalent) from a regionally accredited college or university.
A minimum 2.0 cumulative GPA in all prior college-level coursework.
ceterms:requires.ceterms:description: Students applying for undergraduate admission in a bachelor's program must have:
ceterms:requires.ceterms:name: Brandman University - Undergraduate Requirements - Bachelor's Program
